verbs.description: [ARG0: redskins] [V: release] [ARG1: official 2018 regular - season schedule] the release of the redskins schedule revealed a tough road stretch late in the year which includes a thanksgiving day game for the third straight year new york giants phillip o berry academy of technology kevin hogan kyle kalis nfl washington redskins jay gruden dallas the redskins cowboys
